title: Log in bug
body: I've been having this problem recently where everytime i try to log in it either takes an incredibly long amount of time, or it just doesnt work at all. It doesnt give me a time-out message just a small message about how there was an error. Also sometimes i disconnect from league halfway though a match even though my internet connection is totally fine. Maybe this is unrelated or maybe not. Is anyone else experiencing these problems?

replies.body:
Ye... 
I suggest downloading the[ WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here if you'd like us to help, or submit them in a [Support Ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

This will help us determine if there is actually "nothing" wrong with your internet ^_^

It seems you get many spikes which could be the cause of a unstable connection to riot servers , I recommend using the Connection TroubleShooting guide as mentioned above.

You could be experiencing an unstable connection to the servers. Not only can this cause issues logging in, but it can crash your client entirely if you completely disconnect from the platform. There are a number of different potential causes to this, however, our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the most frequent solutions.
